categories.name: Coffee
categories.description: Coffee is a brewed drink prepared from roasted coffee beans, which are the seeds of berries from the Coffea plant. Coffee is brewed by diluting a large amount of nearly boiling water with the roasted coffee beans. The resulting coffee is called Espresso, and is served hot, without any added milk.

categories.name: Tea
categories.description: Tea is a beverage made from Camellia sinensis leaves, the leaves of Camellia sinensis, grown for their leafy green leaves and flower heads. The leaves are used to make a wide variety of beverages, including many herbal teas, and many types of beverages made from sugar cane juice, such as lemonade, made from sugar cane juice, and sugar-sweetened beverages, such as honey and lemonade.
